subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
Basketball
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The victory is the first in the N.C.A.A. tournament for the Monarchs. The Fighting Irish had a chance to tie the game in the closing seconds, but Carleton Scott missed a 3-pointer.
snippet: The victory is the first in the N.C.A.A. tournament for the Monarchs. The Fighting Irish had a chance to tie the game in the closing seconds, but Carleton Scott missed a 3-pointer.
